changeSet.author: Venky, Shyam
changeSet.comment: Adding Concepts for WoundDressing Form

changeSet.author: Venky, Shyam

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Dressing room", "Sedation room", "EMONO room") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "WD, Dressing station");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to WD, Dressing station

changeSet.author: Venky, Shyam

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_reference_term where code in ("XA9NE6", "XA6599", "XA4983", "XA3RT8", "XA67V4", "XA2V14", "XA6AP4", "XA47V8", "XA8BE2", "XA1XM4", "XA4LC9", "XA7WB0", "XA3VA7", "XA5R12", "XA5R12", "XA3NY8", "XA8DJ6", "XA6TR8", "XA7MK8", "XA2C62", "XA01U5", "XA7D89", "XA86S4", "XA20Q1", "XA0JV9", "XA15W6", "XA8182", "XA3H13", "XA6CW5", "XA9K79", "XA7VQ4", "XA4TQ2", "XA9S09", "XA8KL5", "XA4DM3", "XA77E9", "XA3YG1", "XA33X4", "XA45A6", "XA4QS6", "XA2ZF0", "XA7AA6", "XA53N9", "XA3PZ3", "XA17J1", "XA2ND5", "XA34G7", "XA2ND5", "XA5S78", "XA98B3", "XA0183", "XA5D93", "XA6GV0", "XA12C1", "XA9ET2", "XA82W3", "XA14W3", "XA53X6", "XA3FR3", "XA10L7", "XA9FF8", "XA6809", "XA4BA8", "XA6AR5", "XA0SH5", "XA2J63") and retired = 0 and concept_source_id = ( select concept_source_id from concept_reference_source where name = "WHO / ICD-11-WHO" and retired =0 );
